## ğŸš€ Quick Start Paths

### Path 1: Deploy to Vercel (Fastest)
1. Read: `README.md` â†’ "Vercel" section
2. Run: `vercel`
3. Done! âœ…

### Path 2: Test Locally First
1. Read: `README.md` â†’ "Node.js Server" section
2. Run: `start.bat` (Windows) or `npm start`
3. Visit: http://localhost:3000
4. Then deploy using `DEPLOYMENT.md`

### Path 3: Docker Deployment
1. Read: `DEPLOYMENT.md` â†’ "Docker Deployment" section
2. Build and run container
3. Deploy to your container platform

### Path 4: Custom Server (AWS, Digital Ocean, etc.)
1. Read: `DEPLOYMENT.md` â†’ Your platform section
2. Follow platform-specific instructions
3. Deploy!

## ğŸ“‹ Pre-Deployment Checklist

Before deploying, make sure you have:

- [ ] Read `README.md` for basic understanding
- [ ] Chosen a hosting platform
- [ ] Prepared environment variables (if needed)
- [ ] Decided on a custom domain (optional)
- [ ] Reviewed `BUILD_SUMMARY.md` production checklist
